CustomField.formula: IF ( ISPICKVAL( Cancel_Request_Type__c , "Trial"), ( Months_Paid_Trial__c * Current_MSF_including_Voice__c ) + (( Save_Term__c - New_Free_Months__c ) * Save_MSF__c ) , (( Save_Term__c - New_Free_Months__c ) * Save_MSF__c ) - ( Months_Remaining_Annual__c * Current_MSF_including_Voice__c))
CustomField.label: Keep Amount
